Package javelin.model.world.location

Class Academy

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.Actor
      • javelin.model.world.location.Location
        • javelin.model.world.location.Fortification
          • javelin.model.world.location.Academy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicAcademy, DisciplineAcademy, Guild, MagesGuild, SummoningCircle
    public abstract class Academy
extends Fortification
    A place where units can go to learn about a general topic - be it physical feats or intellectual or magical prowess.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Academy.BuildAcademies
      Like Academy.BuildAcademy except allows for 1 academy of the given type per town rank.
      static class  Academy.BuildAcademy
      Builds one academy of this type.

    • Method Detail

      • train

        public static boolean train()
        Normally training units don't get out of the academy by themselves since this would mean being alone in the wild but if the game is about to be lost due to the absence of Squads then the unit gets out to prevent the game from ending.
        Returns:
        false if there was no unit in training.

      • getcombatants

        public java.util.List<Combatant> getcombatants()
        Specified by:
        getcombatants in class Actor
        Returns:
        Any combatants that are situated in this actor, may return null if this is not a valid request for this type of actor. For performance if a List is returned it should be the canonical one, and thus should not be directly modified by the receiver.
        See Also:
        Combatant.newid()

      • full

        public boolean full()
        Returns:
        true if already has the maximum number of upgrades.

      • moveout

        public Squad moveout​(TrainingOrder o,
                     Combatant member)
        Applies the upgrade and adjustments. Currently never creates a new squad because this isn't being called from {@link WorldActor#turn(long, javelin.view.screen.WorldScreen).}
        Parameters:
        o - Training information.
        member - Joins a nearby Squad or becomes a new one.
        p - Place the training was realized.
        member - Member to be returned (upgraded or not, in case of cancel).
        Returns:
        The Squad the trainee is now into.

      • getel

        public java.lang.Integer getel​(java.lang.Integer attackerel)
        Description copied from class: Actor
        Called when an Incursion reaches its target (and for selecting targets).
        Overrides:
        getel in class Fortification
        Parameters:
        attackerel - Given an attacking encounter level... (may pass null to locations which should be "absolute" EL)
        Returns:
        the defending encounter level. A null value is allowed for places that should not be conquered. Integer.MIN_VALUE means an automatic victory for the attacker.
        See Also:
        Actor.impermeable, Incursion.fight(int, int), ChallengeCalculator.calculateel(List)
